plot: In a future war, a young battle robot pilot suspected of being a spy must face court martial. Meanwhile, the home village of a friend of his is threatened by enemy forces.
title: Kidô senshi Gandamu: Dai 08 MS shôtai - Mirâzu ripôto
plot_es: In a future war, a young battle robot pilot suspected of being a spy must face court martial. Meanwhile, the home village of a friend of his is threatened by enemy forces.
original_name: Kidô senshi Gandamu: Dai 08 MS shôtai - Mirâzu ripôto
plot_en: In a future war, a young battle robot pilot suspected of being a spy must face court martial. Meanwhile, the home village of a friend of his is threatened by enemy forces.
